verbs.description: Conservatives [V: are] upping pressure on Majority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R - Ky . ) to either keep the Senate in session longer during the week or delay the August recess in order to catch up on funding the government and President Trump 's nominees . GOP Sen. David Perdue ( Ga. ) , White House legislative affairs director Marc Short and conservative outside groups joined forces on Tuesday to urge the Senate GOP leader to ramp up the chamber 's work ...
